results.title: [The effect of hypolipemic therapy with diet and simvastatin on the course of angina pectoris and the results of exercise stress test in patients with coronary artery disease].
results.text_hl: In all blood sampling and treadmill stress test were made, and next in all hypolipemic diet and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 20 mg were recommended.

results.title: Statin-associated lower urinary tract symptoms: data mining of the public version of the FDA adverse event reporting system, FAERS.
results.text_hl: Analysis of individual statins showed that @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ had significant disproportionality for voiding @<m>DISEASE_Signs_and_Symptoms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012816 @@@symptoms@@@, while @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_pitavastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C108475 @@@pitavastatin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@lovastatin@@@ had significant disproportionality for storage @<m>DISEASE_Signs_and_Symptoms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012816 @@@symptoms@@@.

citations.NLM: Fujimoto M, Hosomi K, Takada M. Statin-associated lower urinary tract symptoms: data mining of the public version of the FDA adverse event reporting system, FAERS. Int J Clin Pharmacol Ther. 2014 Apr;52(4):259-66. PMID: 24472404
